projects.title: Arc Haven Residence
projects.description: A modern family home featuring arc-integrated living spaces that maximize natural light.
projects.fullDescription: This residential project showcases our signature arc-based design philosophy, creating flowing spaces that connect seamlessly with the natural environment. The central living area features a dramatic curved ceiling that draws the eye upward while allowing natural light to cascade throughout the space.

projects.title: Serenity Commercial Plaza
projects.description: A commercial space designed with arc elements to create a calming work environment.
projects.fullDescription: This commercial project reimagines the traditional office space by incorporating gentle arcs throughout the design. From the reception area to meeting rooms, curved walls and ceilings create a sense of flow and reduce stress in the workplace.
